content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at Position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe Group (Steam) connecting various positions, starting from (x=3.5, y=17.5)
- Pipe Group (Water) connecting various positions, starting from (x=-9.5, y=23.5)
- Electricity Group with poles at multiple positions, starting from (x=27.5, y=26.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
